title: How long do Early Sales last?
body: Hi! I was wondering how long the Early Sales last? I really want to buy the Dark Star Thresh skin but Im oom (out of money hehe). I get more money on wednesday (28th). So I wonder if im going to be able purchase the skin in time. Srry if my English is bad and thanks in advace!

replies.body: Which early sale are you referring to?  Announcements like[ December Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/december-sales-schedule-0)will include items that will go on sale at the beginning of the month, but doesn't provide a specific date.  If you're waiting on a sale that hasn't occurred yet, there's just a few days left!
